name: Beavis and Butthead Do An RPG
name_original: Beavis and Butthead Do An RPG
description:
Beavis and Butthead have been sucked in to the world of Van Jhina (heheh....sounds like vagina...), a land of no TVs. The duo must fight their way through this world so they don't miss their monster truck show.

...And vanquish evil, I guess.
